headline: Will Flowers Foods' (FLO) Board Shakeup Reveal a New Approach to Growth and Leadership?
summary: Flowers Foods recently announced the addition of Sterling A. Spainhour, an executive vice president and chief legal officer at Southern Company, to its board effective October 1, 2025, along with the planned retirement of CFO Steve Kinsey at the end of 2025 after 36 years of service. Spainhour's expertise in mergers and acquisitions, legal frameworks, and corporate governance could provide important guidance as the company manages leadership transitions and business evolution. We’ll examine...

headline: U.S. Utility Capex Forecast Nudges Higher On Increased Generation Spending Plans
summary: Aggregate energy utility investments are projected to reach $227.80 billion in 2026, $233.30 billion in 2027 and $214.84 billion in 2028. Read more here.
